idea:
Xtrovert Global OPC Pvt Ltd is into trading of agriculture commodity form India. We are connected with various farmers in different parts of India.

We are currently working on project to develop organic pesticides which will help farmers to project their crops against various insects and also prevent use of chemical pesticides.

Also we are working on project to develop organic manure from waste which will provide farmers organic manure which enhances productivity of crops and hence demand in foreign market,
name: XTROVERT GLOBAL OPC PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SuperWise is a real-time mobile construction project management solution that aims to bring transparency and timeliness to the construction industry. With real-time collaboration between planning, procurement and execution, SuperWise enables companies to achieve on-time and in-budget project completion.
name: SUPERWISE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
https://drstore.in/

Drstore.in is India's first & only Group Procurement Organisation (GPO) for hospitals, small & medium nursing homes & stand-alone clinics and an exclusive digital marketplace for doctors & Service Providers. Drstore.in offers array of comprehensive products & services to meet the burgeoning needs of hospitals, nursing homes and hospitals serve as one-stop shop to meet most of their needs. 

The current healthcare landscape is highly fragmented with multiple players operate in specific verticals and predominantly focus in local geographies. At the same time, many companies struggle to penetrate in smaller, B & C category cities and towns. Quite a few doctors are not aware & well-informed about their best choices due to lack of an integrated marketplace. Drstore.in is conceived to address these gaps keeping all these specific needs in mind. This is a first of its kind, GPO which even serves as a marketplace for the healthcare practitioners, nursing homes & other healthcare service providers. Drstore.in is providing multiple solutions like clinic diagnostic equipment & kits, clinic supplies and consumables, medical implants & basic patient care medical products and other services to meet specific needs of clinics, nursing homes & hospitals. It is an omnichannel model which provide doctors & hospitals & other customers direct access to wide range of products & services, hence enabling positive business outcomes.
name: Drstore Healthcare Services India Pvt Ltd (India First n Only Group Purchase Company for Hospitals)

idea: Pinkstripes is a career ecosystem for women. Our mission is to ensure that every woman has access to the support infrastructure required for sustaining/relaunching her career.
name: PINKSTRIPES TECH SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Company Profile

Bringle Academy is using a patented tool of SkillsMaping & suggesting right jobs and courses for the realignment of 3 billion individuals wrt the right job roles. It's a low cost model where in an individual gets his/her SkillsProfile as low as Rs.500/-.

Currently, targeting a revenue of $100 MM USD by 2020 with a small investment of $5 MM USD & an upside projections of $2 Bn in next 5 years.

We have business offerings for K12, College students and Corporate Professionals. Marketed through B2B model of Educational Institutes, Corporates and Franchisee Development
name: Bringle Academy's SDC

idea:
#LakhiBagh - SkillsVardaan

#LakhiBagh – Making of #AamAadmi a #KhaasAadmi…

…Generating 100K employment for RuralTalent, SchoolDropouts, Housewives & SpecialChildren

Establishing #GyanVardaanKendras (Digital Labs) in Mumbai, Pune, Bhilai, Nasik, Vadodara, Ahmedabad to run the below program.

While Akbar built the Lakhi Bagh (near Darbhanga) of 100 thousand mango trees, Shah Jehan built a special courier lane between Delhi and Mahratta Coast so that he could have mangoes till the beginning of spring. And, #Reliance developed Orchard named Dhirubhai Ambani Lakhibag Amrayee where they have cultivated 167 varieties of mangoes on dwarf trees at Jamnagar refinery.

We sincerely believe that there is a connection between aam & aadmi and hence we are working to make them #Khaas and have taken an initiative as #LakhiBagh on this 71st #IndependenceDay to provide #1LakhJobs from the available talent in Rural or backward areas, School dropouts, Housewives and Special children (#AamAadmi) by identifying their unique talent, upskill them and get them placed in either full time or part time opportunities (#SkillsVardaan).

For this purpose, we conduct special curriculum activities making learning fun and hone their skills holistically. These skills are helpful to get the learning’s effectively increasing their grasping power. These skills will also helps to improve Creative & Logical thinking, Decision making capabilities along with the domain expertise. All the individuals would be going through our complete process of SkillsMapping, UpSkilling & Placements.
name: BRINGLE EXCELLENCE LLP

idea:
Datacurate is a Big Data Analytics consulting company, with the goal of helping organisations operationalise data-driven decision making. Using practical, innovative and purpose-built solutions based on Industry standard products, we fast track business outcomes and de-risk your investment.


Data is the backbone of any Digital transformation and Artificial intelligence initiative. As organisations go up the maturity curve in leveraging Digital and Artificial Intelligence, the importance of data, the key differentiator in this journey, is ever increasing. Data recency, quality and governance is a critical aspect of these initiatives and we intend to provide our expertise to support organizations get this right. Most of the corporates in data have a poor data infrastructure with processes for data governance missing. Datacurate aims at helping organizations significantly improving in this area so that decisions are made on the most recent and correct data.
name: DATACURATE TECHNOLOGIES LLP
